meanings.definition: A malignant tumor of the placenta.
meanings.sent1: The doctors diagnosed the patient with choriocarcinomata after conducting tests.
meanings.sent2: The hospital reported a rise in cases of choriocarcinomata in pregnant women.
meanings.sent3: The choriocarcinomata in the placenta seemed to have a mind of its own, growing rapidly.
meanings.sent4: Her choriocarcinomata was like a dark cloud looming over her pregnancy.
meanings.sent5: The image of the choriocarcinomata invading the placenta was haunting.

meanings.sent1: The lab results showed multiple choriocarcinomata in the samples.
meanings.sent2: The research team studied various choriocarcinomata to understand their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The collection of choriocarcinomata specimens looked like a strange exhibit in the lab.
meanings.sent4: In her dream, the garden was filled with blooming choriocarcinomata instead of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The textbook had detailed illustrations of different choriocarcinomata for study purposes.
